citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:10am on 30-
MAR-2022. Inspector arrived on campus and attempted to contact facility representatives by phone. Walked around
building and knocked on main door and veterinary clinic door; all entrances to facility were locked. Inspector continued to
knock at facility entrance and reach out to facility representatives by phone, but was unable to make contact prior to
leaving the facility at 10:42am.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:10am on 30-
MAR-2022. Inspector arrived on campus and attempted to contact facility representatives by phone. Walked around 
building and knocked on main door and veterinary clinic door; all entrances to facility were locked. Inspector continued to 
knock at facility entrance and reach out to facility representatives by phone, but was unable to make contact prior to 
leaving the facility at 10:42am. 
 
 
 
End Section
